check_34.description: Minimize the admission of containers with capabilities assigned

check_1.description: Ensure each container has a configured memory request

check_2.description: Ensure each container has a configured memory limit

check_4.description: Ensure each container has a configured CPU request

check_5.description: Ensure each container has a configured CPU limit

check_3.description: Container Requests Not Equal To It's Limits

check_6.description: Container CPU Requests Not Equal To It's Limits

check_10.description: Prevent containers from sharing the host's PID namespace

check_11.description: Prevent containers from sharing the host's IPC namespace

check_12.description: Prevent containers from sharing the host's network namespace

check_13.description: Prevent containers from accessing host files by using high UIDs

check_14.description: Prevent containers from accessing host files by using high GIDs

check_15.description: Prevent containers from mounting Docker socket

check_22.description: Containers should not run with allowPrivilegeEscalation

check_27.description: Use read-only filesystem for containers where possible

check_28.description: Containers should not run as root

check_35.description: Ensure that Service Account Tokens are only mounted where necessary

check_36.description: Ensure that default service accounts are not actively used

check_37.description: Ensure that the Service Account Name Undefined Or Empty

check_48.description: Prevent containers from accessing the underlying host

check_31.description: Ensure that the seccomp profile is set to docker/default or runtime/default

check_32.description: Ensure that the AppArmor profile is set to docker/default or runtime/default
